name: Get Trending Entertainment
description:
Get trending movies and TV shows for today or this week. Discover what's popular and what everyone is watching.

You can:
- Get trending movies and shows
- View by time window (day or week)
- See popularity metrics
- Discover what's hot right now
- Get ratings and release dates

Uses TMDB trending data updated hourly.

** WHEN TO USE **
- User asks "what's trending"
- User wants popular/top movies
- User wants to see what's popular now
- User wants newest releases

** WHEN NOT TO USE **
- User wants specific movie info (use get_movie_details)
- User wants to search (use search_movies)
- User wants recommendations (use get_entertainment_recommendations)

** EXAMPLES **

1. Get trending movies this week:
{
  "media_type": "movie",
  "time_window": "week",
  "limit": 20
}

2. Get trending today:
{
  "media_type": "all",
  "time_window": "day",
  "limit": 15
}

3. Get trending TV shows:
{
  "media_type": "tv",
  "time_window": "week"
}

media_type.description: Type of media to get (default: all)

limit.description: Number of results to return (1-20, default: 10)
